text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ جُمۡلَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۖ وَرَتَّلۡنَٰهُ تَرۡتِيلٗا

translation.en: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly
translation.id: (Dan orang-orang kafir berkata, "Mengapa Alquran itu tidak diturunkan kepadanya sekaligus?" Demikianlah,578) agar Kami memperteguh hatimu (Muhammad) dengannya dan Kami membacakannya secara tartil³ (berangsur-angsur, perlahan dan benar)
